ref: 2357 úlapa m. ʻ bush, shrub, grass ʼ RV., ʻ the grass Saccha- rum cylindricum ʼ lex., ulū˘pa -- , ulūka -- 2 m. lex. [Cf. ulapyà -- ʻ having to do with u˚ ʼ VS., ˚pyá -- MaitrS.]
Pk. ulava -- , ulaya -- m., ulavī -- f. ʻ a species of grass ʼ;
B. ulu ʻ Saccharum cylindricum used for thatching ʼ;
H. ulū, ūlū, ulwā, ullū m. ʻ a kind of creeper, the reed or grass
S. cylindricum ʼ, uraī f. ʻ Andropogon muricatus ʼ.
